titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain Federal lands in San Bernardino County, California, to the San Bernardino Valley Water Conservation District, and to accept in return certain non-Federal lands, and for other purposes.
Santa Ana River Wash Plan Land Exchange Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
